text: I tried the chicken souvlaki there and it was absolutely delicious. The place is very clean and food looks fresh. Great food for a great price! I will be back for more :)

We ordered from zora's for a party, The food was absolutely delicious, everyone loved the chicken souvlaki. I highly recommend people go and eat at this great restaurant, you will not be disappointed.
I order food from zorra express resturant food is perfect and fresh every one love that you can go and order it  very good food and price is unbelievable
